title: show nested components in schematic view

content.raw: the schematic view of the motor+gearbox model is a little confusing.  it would be really excellent if the components of the motor+gearbox were included INSIDE the block called motor+gearbox assembly, instead of just disconnected blocks.  Would be even better if the motor shaft output was connected with a fixed joint to the gearbox input, and gearbox output was a fixed joint to the wheel_axle.
